message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,300,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $1,250,000.  This is a fair price for both of us and allows us to make a deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,250,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1,275,000. This is a fair price that still reflects the value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go up to $1,260,000. It's a good price for both of us, and we can finalize the deal.

I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,260,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $1,290,000. This is the best price I can offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
